mapper.select: SELECT * FROM parkingboard WHERE parking_deleted = 0 ORDER BY (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{parking_lat}))*cos(radians(parking_lat))*cos(radians(parking_lng)-radians(#{parking_lng})) +sin(radians(#{parking_lat}))*sin(radians(parking_lat)))) LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM PARKINGBOARD WHERE parking_type = '장기' AND parking_deleted = 0 AND parking_outtime>= now() ORDER BY parking_id DESC
SELECT * FROM PARKINGBOARD WHERE parking_type = '단기' AND parking_deleted = 0 AND parking_outtime>= now() ORDER BY parking_id DESC

SELECT * FROM PARKINGBOARD, wishlist WHERE (parking_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_title}, '%') OR parking_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_content}, '%') OR parking_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_content}, '%')) AND parking_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_location}, '%') AND parking_type = '장기' AND parking_deleted = 0 AND parking_price <= #{parking_price} AND parking_intime <= #{parking_intime} AND parking_outtime >= #{parking_outtime} AND parkingboard.parking_id = wishlist.parking_id

SELECT * FROM PARKINGBOARD, wishlist WHERE (parking_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_title}, '%') OR parking_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_content}, '%') OR parking_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_content}, '%')) AND parking_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parking_location}, '%') AND parking_type = '단기' AND parking_deleted = 0 AND parking_price <= #{parking_price} AND parking_outtime > #{parking_intime} AND parkingboard.parking_id = wishlist.parking_id
Select rsv_intime, rsv_outtime From reservation join parkingboard using (parking_id) where parking_id = #{parking_id}
SELECT DISTINCT r.* FROM reservation AS rsv JOIN review AS r ON rsv.rsv_id = r.rsv_id JOIN parkingboard AS p ON rsv.parking_id = p.parking_id WHERE rsv.parking_id = #{parking_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parkingboard(owner_id, parking_type, parking_title, parking_content, parking_pic, parking_location, parking_cartype, parking_price, parking_intime, parking_outtime, parking_deleted, parking_lat, parking_lng) VALUES(#{owner_id}, #{parking_type}, #{parking_title}, #{parking_content} , #{parking_pic},#{parking_location},#{parking_cartype},#{parking_price},#{parking_intime},#{parking_outtime},#{parking_deleted},#{parking_lat}, #{parking_lng})
